name: Santa Castle Rescue - A Christmas Hidden Objects
name_original: Santa Castle Rescue - A Christmas Hidden Objects
description:
It's Christmas Celebration, Elves is worried about Santa Claus as he is disappeared. One of the elves found Santa's Reindeer standing outside a wizard's Castle.
An evil magician trapped Santa Claus in his Castle. Santa is locked is the castle and he need your help to find the hidden object and unlock the castle key so he can escape. Rescue Santa by helping him find the hidden object in castle
Till now he didn't return from that castle, they decided to scatter and search for the Santa. The best Santa Hidden objects and Christmas hidden objects style game of its kind. Find the 3D Hidden Objects to get to the key of castle gate. The magical key is the only way out no the magic can help Santa
Help rescue the Santa and escape from the wizard's castle.
